body.p: Quotations are systematically tagged when they appear clearly detached from the continuous text.

note.i: Alternative regulation phase 1: Quotations are systematically tagged if both the quote and the specification of the author appear clearly detached from the continuous text.

body.p: Inline quotations are initially not tagged. In a second processing step, it can entered that the quotation is a quote. However, there is no systematic tagging of inline quotations in the DTA corpus.
